name: Beet and Potato Cutlet/Burger
description: This Beet and Potato Cutlet/Burger recipe is quick and easy to make and a great way to get beets into your everyday meals.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the beet and potato and chop them up.
recipeInstructions.name: Peel the beet and potato and chop them up.

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook them with little water(1/2 cup). Or cook the until they soften in a covered pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook them with little water(1/2 cup). Or cook the until they soften in a covered pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the beet and potato nicely.
recipeInstructions.name: Mash the beet and potato nicely.

recipeInstructions.text: Add salt,pepper. coriander powder, ginger garlic paste and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add salt,pepper. coriander powder, ginger garlic paste and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: The mixture might be a bit squishy, so add half the bread crumbs. you can also use coarsely blended quick cooking oats, to get a less sticky mix.
recipeInstructions.name: The mixture might be a bit squishy, so add half the bread crumbs. you can also use coarsely blended quick cooking oats, to get a less sticky mix.

recipeInstructions.text: In a shallow bowl, mix 2-3 Tablespoons of water with the gram flour and make thin paste.
recipeInstructions.name: In a shallow bowl, mix 2-3 Tablespoons of water with the gram flour and make thin paste.

recipeInstructions.text: Make flat balls of the beet potato mixture. Dip each ball in the gram flour paste to coat well on all sides and dip the flat ball in the bread crumbs.
recipeInstructions.name: Make flat balls of the beet potato mixture. Dip each ball in the gram flour paste to coat well on all sides and dip the flat ball in the bread crumbs.

recipeInstructions.text: Shallow fry the cutlets/burgers 5 minutes on each side.
recipeInstructions.name: Shallow fry the cutlets/burgers 5 minutes on each side.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with cilantro chutney or between bread slices with favorite dressing!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with cilantro chutney or between bread slices with favorite dressing!

keywords: meatfree burger, vegan burger, vegetable burger
